name: Voyager Corvette
description: This ship can one shot all ships up to Tier 8. When it loses it's shield a built in position bolt will activate it will fire 5 shots before deactivating. If it gets destroyed the black hole powering the ship will be realased destroying all ships in the battle. 2 Leviathans should be enough to destroy it.
obtaining: You must go to Morder and head to Mt. Doom into the fire of Orodruin. After that you will create the One ship to rule them all.
tips-builds: Use the force Luke and you'll find the perfect build
author: Warmaster
